issue.title: [C++/Python] pyarrow.Table.equals segmentation fault on None
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4822](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4822). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Calling `pyarrow.Table.equals` with `None` causes a segmentation fault; this should be caught.
